item.description:
Free Spiritual Gatherings with Isabeau Esby
A supportive and informative evening of spiritual and intellectual discussion. Come to ask questions, share experiences and learn more about the spiritual world around you. Discussions vary each week, all belief systems welcomed. Your group facilitator will be Isabeau Esby, Life Path Psychic Medium and Intuitive Counselor

Location - Yoga by Donation, 147 Congress St, Suite C, Portsmouth, NH
Yoga by Donation is located above the Portsmouth Health Food Store
Dates - 1st and 3rd Sundays of each month
Time - 7:00 PM to 8:30 PM, registration is NOT required, drop ins welcome, open to the public
Cost - While the cost is free, donations are accepted for the meeting location (Yoga by Donation)
item.how_to_find_us: It is located about the Portsmouth Health Food Store, enter the back door and go up to the top floor
item.name: Free Spiritual Gatherings with Isabeau Esby
